description: This file defines a Next.js page component for displaying recipe details. It includes static generation functions, metadata generation, and the main React component rendering recipe information using data fetched from mock data functions.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Provides a list of pre-rendered recipe IDs for static site generation.

methods.name: generateMetadata
methods.description: Generates SEO-optimized metadata for a specific recipe page based on its ID.
